metadata.title: PriceLess Med
metadata.description: Your trusted partner for affordable healthcare services in the UAE.

home.title: Home
home.description: Access affordable medical checkups, specialist care, and hospital services in UAE.

about.title: About Us

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with our support team or send us your inquiries.

hero.title: Say goodbye to costly healthcare
hero.description: Save AED 3,000+ annually on everything from checkups to specialist care.

steps_one.title: Find your perfect deal
steps_one.description: Explore hundreds of deals across dentistry, diagnostics, specialists, and wellness services at top-rated clinics.

steps_two.title: Connect with your clinic
steps_two.description: View clinic details, location, and contact information. Reach out directly to book your appointment at a time that works for you.

steps_three.title: Show up & save
steps_three.description: Present your PricelessMed voucher at the clinic and enjoy savings of up to 70% on quality healthcare.

healthcare.title: Healthcare discounts
healthcare.desc: Access exclusive vouchers and deals from top clinics across the UAE.

surgical.title: Surgical quotation
surgical.desc: Get personalized quotes from leading hospitals based on your needs.

emergency.title: Emergency care
emergency.desc: Access to emergency rooms and urgent care facilities across the UAE.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about saving on healthcare

savingHome.title: DOWNLOAD OUR APP
savingHome.heading: Save on healthcare wherever you are
savingHome.description: Discover discounted health services, manage your vouchers, and locate nearby participating providers. Download the app and start saving on your healthcare today.

contactSales.title: ARE YOU A HOSPITAL OR A CLINIC?
contactSales.subtitle: Join our growing network
contactSales.description: We have 1,000+ healthcare providers across the UAE who are attracting new patients, filling appointments, and building loyalty through PricelessMed.
